name: Gunslugs 2
description: The black duck army is back! They are sending signals into space, which can't be good... In fact, the army has teamed up with aliens! You and the gunslug squad have to defeat the risen army with all their might again before its too late. And of course the slugs have enough equipment to do that. Flamethrowers, tanks, guns and many more are at your disposal and ready to kick some alien butt!
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
